website_summaries.verdict: A decent, budget bikini trimmer. If you want something with more features, we recommend the Braun instead.
pros: A basic bikini trimmer that is designed for contouring delicate areas
Has cleaning brush that makes it easy to clean after use
cons: It's slightly noisy when in operation

customer_reviews.title: Not to be too graphic, this thing can clear ...
customer_reviews.text: Not to be too graphic, this thing can clear a rainforest. Let's just say I had been au naturale for a while and my schick intuition wasn't cut out for the job so we had to bring in some extra help. This baby has some power in it. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Replacement blade has been discontinued!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. The shaver works beautifully, but you cannot sharpen the blade or purchase a replacement blade. The blade has been discontinued!! I bought this product in January of 2016, around a year ago. The blade became dull so I tried to purchase a replacement one and Panasonic has discontinued this part. I even tried to get a blade on ebay, but there are none. The shaver is now basically useless.
customer_reviews.author: casual shopper

customer_reviews.title: No hassle and effective
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm...how to review this? I am lazy, and do not always want to shave my...........private area.This is a great tool to trim "everything" up, without a lot of hassle. There you have it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Love it - Bought one for me and a second one for the dog
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchased this item. I use it and have never nicked my skin. I like how solid it is and the wide head for bikini, legs or underarms. I purchased this same product over 5 years ago and I now use it on my dog (a hairy Havanese)! Great for the dog because there is no cord and it's not noisy. I can get real close to her eyes, nose and mouth.
customer_reviews.author: gr8day

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ladies or men
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Trims great. i do not use the guard at all. I am hoping it does not quit working like I read in other reviews. No nipping with this like the clippers did. It has pinched a couple of times in certain spots, just take you time. You do have to take a break it you are really doing a good trim, it will get hot. But this is exactly the kind of trimmer I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: ajordan414

customer_reviews.title: PAINFUL, pulls hair.
customer_reviews.text: I had an old version of this so thought this would be a good one to try again since my last bikini shaver died. It's awful -- pulls hair constantly. I do not recommend this unless you are using the blade adjuster. Using it without the adjuster to get a closer trim is painful.
customer_reviews.author: cbg

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item twice and both times it just stopped working for no reason. When the first one stopped working, I thought it was just a fluke so I decided to buy another one because I liked the shaver when it actually worked. The second one also stopped working and it didn't even last as long as the first one did. I don't use it a lot, maybe once or twice a month, and I couldn't think of anything that I could have done to damage this thing. It seems to just be a faulty product. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Britaniya

customer_reviews.title: Omg life saver in minutes
customer_reviews.text: I get up at 4 30am during the weekday work 40 hours , running behind a toddler I aint got time ! Havent shaved in monthssss🤦🏽‍♀️🤷🏽‍♀️🤣. I can care less but i felt bad for my boyfriend since he manscapes and told me he can barely see it !. I looked at my razor and it said don't even think about it so this was my next option. I knew it would take hours with that razor🤣🤣. This!!! alllll hair was gone in less than 4 minutes no nicks, or nestle crunch bar bumps! My boyfriend is like 😍😍 and I feel like🏆🏆🏆. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: AddictedtoAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great for novice or advanced trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: Great, inexpensive product that gets the job done! This was my first trimmer I wasn't sure what to expect... Well, ever heard the saying: "It's so easy, even a caveman can do it?" Well yeah, it's just that simple. I didn't read all the product information before buying and I was expecting differently sized replacement guards, you know, like men's clippers, but I'm glad there was just the one! It made it less intimidating and after the first use, I can say that I am pleasantly surprised! Like other reviews state, this item is not waterproof and it is more efficient when used on dry skin. It's compact, easy to clean and stores nicely anywhere in the bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Is zero stars an option?
customer_reviews.text: I used this product once and when I went to use it a second time, it no longer worked. I checked the batteries, etc., but no luck. I understand that it was $14, but I assumed I could get more than one use from it (and seeing how it's now bathing suit season...) So I'm now on the search for another one. I definitely do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cee

customer_reviews.title: Tamed the beast
customer_reviews.text: After being literally traumatized by shaving down there this is the breath of fresh air I needed! TOTALLY PAINLESS!!! If you are like me and let it go due to past injuries...haha... this is for you! I could even go to unchartered territory out of sight and no cuts or razor bumps!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst trimmer ever
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work at all for me. I felt the issue was that with the plastic piece on that controls the length of the trim, even when at the shortest amount, it didn't do anything at all. I kept going over the same areas repeatedly and no good. Then I tried with the plastic piece removed entirely and that was worse--the hair wanted to get tangled in the blade part. I will continue using a different electric shaver that isn't targeted towards bikini trimming without actually being effective.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: I had to cut myself free from it.
customer_reviews.text: So I got this in the mail relatively fast and I was really happy with that. I started using it when I got it and it worked great for the first 2 uses. However, I was in the middle of trimming and then it died with my hair caught in it. I had to cut the damn thing off of my area. After that I tried changing the batteries but it still wouldn’t turn on. I just bought this product for 20$ and didn’t even get to really use it. I guess they figure 10$ peruse lol.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie Hodil

customer_reviews.title: Great and powerful trimmer, battery compartment prone to rust and thus damage.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this and loves it. Close trim, no nicks. However she kept in the shower away from the water, but the mist and steam from the shower every day still rusted the battery compartment. The first time it happened she cleaned the rust off and it worked. Second time it happened, it stopped working completely. Definitely store this trimmer in a completely dry area and remove the batteries after each use if you want it to last for a while. Next iteration of this product should have a more secure battery compartment that isn't as prone to collecting water; and rust damage.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Simple & easy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best personal trimmer I’ve ever had the pleasure of owning. The guard gets nice & close to the skin if you want it to without letting the blade get too close to the skin, which fully prevents irritation. It comes with a small brush to facilitate easy cleaning, & it doesn’t drain the batteries (i haven’t changed the batteries since I purchased it nearly 6 months ago).
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Quinn

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good trimmer. I have a short hair style
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good trimmer. I have a short hair style, so I use it to keep the visible hair trimmed at the base of my neck. I've used other brands, but this one has worked the best. I appreciate the fact that it uses AA batteries. My previous trimmers all have been rechargeable. Sadly, they had to be replaced simply because their batteries wore out. Their blades were still sharp enough. Oh, well....
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mac

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING SINCE BAKED BREAD!
customer_reviews.text: HOW DID LIVE WITHOUT THIS?! Ladies have you ever been subject to cuts by trying to trim yourself with scissors. FEAR NOT. This is worth EVERY CENT of your money. No worries about cutting or injuring yourself. It has adjustments so you can trim and style your *ahem* hedge how you want! I am SOOOOO glad my bridesmaid recommended me this.
customer_reviews.author: Saiho Kwan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for four years and am overall pleased. I agree with other reviews that it works best on dry hair right before taking a shower. I use it on the shortest setting. In the 4 years I've had it, I think I've replaced the batteries once or twice. It is starting to give out on me a bit, but not consistently -- it seems to occasionally run low on power and not because of old batteries. For roughly $15, I can deal with buying another one after all this time.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 4+ years of use
customer_reviews.text: This razor recently started to not work great for me- it wasn't cutting hair at all- then I realized I had had it for 4+ years with fairly regular use and I was probably just dull from time! For the price, I think 4 years of use is great. I never had any experience with it pulling hair or cutting me. I thought I would maybe try out a smaller electric razor, but based on the reviews of other razors, I decided to stick with this one since it worked so well for me!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I can only trim things down there because I get horrible ingrown hairs, and before this product, I used a tiny pair of scissors. I was tired of being afraid of cutting myself and the process taking ages, so I decided to try a bikini trimmer. I use the guard on level one. I like this trimmer for several reasons: it makes trimming A LOT faster, I'm not afraid of cutting myself, the trim comes out even. BUT I also dislike some things about it: it's a little big and hard to maneuver around all the curves and crevices, it won't cut flattened out hair, and of course, it's not easy to clean. But overall a success!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after 5 months and only one use
customer_reviews.text: Bought in Dec 2017. It worked one time. May 2018 it wouldn’t turn on at all. I tried new batteries and it still doesn’t work. This was my second time buying this product also. The first one lasted over a year at least. I wish I could give this zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: MLA

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, breaks quickly
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last! Threw away this week. I had a different type of trimmer that lasted years, this one is junk
customer_reviews.author: D & J Moore

customer_reviews.title: While it worked I liked it. It did what it's made to do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on 4/16. It died on 12/16. While it worked I liked it. It did what it's made to do. Easy clean and small product to store. But it really should last more than 8 months. Very disappointed it that it has just up and died. I expected a Panasonic product to do better than that. Don't like my money wasted on junky stuff.
customer_reviews.author: R56redmond

customer_reviews.title: and the adjustable heights was perfect to get it close to my head
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this to use on my undercut (back of my hair on my head/hair style) as a woman, and it worked out so perfectly! I was looking for a razor that was travel size, portable, cordless and even had different adjustable heights to use on my undercut. And this product did all of those things! It did not snag my hair once, and the adjustable heights was perfect to get it close to my head, and the completely remove the guard to trim my neck (with no pain!). I am extremely happy with this product, and it will go with me around the world since I travel so much! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Hartwig

customer_reviews.title: Works until it doesn't; not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was initially very pleased with this product, but it stopped working after 11 months. Panasonic replaced it since it was in warranty, and I used the second trimmer until that stopped working after 3 months. They replaced it again, then the third trimmer stopped after 2 months. This time, they sent the replacement to an incorrect address. They then expected me to call whoever lived there to return the item, despite the error being their fault. They have since refused to correct this error despite repeated attempts, claiming they can only do so if I file a police report that the the third replacement was stolen. Absolutely ridiculous. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Worked great! Until... it died.
customer_reviews.text: It worked fantastic for trimming the lady parts and then... it just... died recently. I got it a month ago? Super sad. Tried changing the batteries several times. It's a goner.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as advertised. Consistently pulls hair instead of clipping it. Extremely uncomfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use. Does What Is Promised
customer_reviews.text: Because of the current Corona Virus non essential business shut down going on in my state, I was almost 3 weeks past my usual waxing timeframe. I did not want to use a standard shaver, because I knew it would be 10,000 deaths worth of pain the next time I got waxed if I went down that road for a quick temporary fix. I wanted to trim very low as opposed to shaved bare for that reason. I got it today, used it ever so quickly today. It is easy to use and gave me the results I desired. I definitely recommend this trimmer :-)
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, highly recommended...
customer_reviews.text: I use these clippers for trimming my bear. The guide is useful for trimming different thickness of beards. And the bare clippers trim almost as close as a shaver. I also use it to shave my head. Bought one for my wife (for her y-area), one for me ( beard & head), and for my son (face shaving, etc). Great value, great versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Joolz

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months :-(
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this razor back in January and it stopped working today. There is only a 30 day return window so now I'm stuck with a razor that doesn't work. I'm really disappointed because it was a good razor for the time it was working. I would have highly recommended this razor if it had lasted.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: best so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of bikini shavers, but this one by far is the best. It convenient to use, has minimum and most useful attachments. I hate when they sell 8-10 attachments for double the price when you don't even need them! Only drawback, I wish there was a way to remove the blade and wash it/sanitize it. That took away 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: shruti

customer_reviews.title: THE LITTLE TRIMMER THAT CAN!
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed and easy to use hair, beard, and body hair trimmer. Runs for a long time on 2 standard or premium AA batteries (I use lithium cells due to long periods of suitcase storage). Cuts fine to coarse hair cleanly without pulling the hairs. Very easy to clean. Use of commonly available battery assures operation world-wide. I would buy again, and while I do not advocate giving electric appliances as gifts this may be a great gift for anyone who needs a compact, reliable cordless trimmer for home or travel.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Can I give it ten stars???
customer_reviews.text: By far the BEST product I have found! Definitely not a waste. Gets extremely close to the skin while being so gentle. I have thick, coarse hair and nothing else I have found gives you a shave like this little gadget. It’s been with me for quite a few months now. I have yet to change the batteries either! Would definitely purchase again even though you won’t have to because it is very durable and holds its own.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Richard

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Got it less than a year ago and only used 2-3 times and it stopped working. Tried changing new batteries but that wasn’t the problem. Nothing happens when I turn it on...it’s just dead.
customer_reviews.author: Curious4

customer_reviews.title: Used three times then it died
customer_reviews.text: The price should have been my first warning. This trimmer worked only so-so on a good day and then completely stopped working after three uses. I changed the batteries twice, so it wasn't a battery issue. It sounded like the motor just died. Since I only used it about once a month, I missed my window for an Amazon return, so that was $20 down the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey S.

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and purchase it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this trimmer in January of 2018 and it just died April of 2019. It could be partially my fault because I use it in the shower on wet hair. I’ve never submerge it in water but it does get wet. I don’t think I have changed the battery since I got it. If so it’s only been changed once or twice. You do have to be a little careful not to nick yourself if you don’t use the guard (which I don’t). I wish it came with more than one guard for closer cut option without putting blade to skin. Overall great product. I’m purchasing another one now.
customer_reviews.author: Syreeta

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer!! A couple things could be better though
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I like how you can adjust the length of the trim and the trimmer is very safe — I have not gotten any nicks. However, the trimmer is definitely a trimmer rather than a shaver. In other words, it is unable to cleanly shave off hair completely, even when the guard is taken off the trimmer. If I want to be completely bare around the bikini, that’s not possible with this trimmer. Also, the trimmer heats up easily, which doesn’t bother me (it’s just warm, it doesn’t get unbearably hot), it’s just something I noticed that was a little abnormal.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Nagashima

customer_reviews.title: Will get the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Listen, all I can say without getting too TMI is the Japanese really got it right with this one. I previously had a Remington trimmer and it broke several weeks back. So you can imagine the situation I was trying to .... ahem... tackle. Well this thing is the best trimmer I have used ever by FAR. Quiet, swiftly gets the job done, and absolutely won’t cut the skin unlike the previous trimmer I had used. It also gets a wildly close shave if that’s what you’re looking for. I would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: 1blackdog

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: I, like a lot of other reviewers, had a baby and kind of lost touch when keeping myself trimmed. I have never used a trimmer before and it was very easy to use. There is an adjustable clipper guard so you can adjust the length. Very easy to use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Swimsuit season must have
customer_reviews.text: Simple product that helps keep things neat. Great alternative to the razor bumps no one seems immune to. Note that it will not work on damp skin. It cannot come in contact with water or it will stop working, but if you’re willing to make that small adjustment this is a great product
customer_reviews.author: AlyciaN24

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It works. It's not a super close shave and you have to be careful but it does most of the work for you. I just go over the areas again gently with my razor in the shower for a smooth shave and using this beforehand makes that process sooo much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Julia K

customer_reviews.title: Horrible - Bikini Blood Bath
customer_reviews.text: will Never use Electric shaver again. Not a Bikini Shaper....Bikini Blood bath. It cut me. I was careful and used a mirror
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bikini area
customer_reviews.text: I was previously using the Remington Bikini Trimmer for my bikini area but barely used all of the attachments. Then it seemed like the batteries barely lasted after a few uses. I just needed a simple trimmer that was heavy duty. Found this and it’s perfect. I was scared at first because I read some reviews where it caught on to skin. But I didn’t cut myself. I just made sure to go slow and hold the skin very taut. I was also able to go against the grain just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Herrington

customer_reviews.title: This is really great, especially for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is really great, especially for the cost. Only thing is it cuts 'too' close on 'extra' sensitive skin, if u catch my drift. But it does come with a cap type thing to adjust the hair length, but I like basically a 'clean as a whistle' shave so I opt to take it off. I recommend it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M. Russen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 3 years and it still works as well as it did the day I recieved it. The adjustable guide is nice, though I mostly use the lowest setting. This is also very energy efficient - I think I've only changed the batteries twice!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Died after one month
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. I've had it one month and its completely stopped working. I've changed the batteries multiple times and used a range of different battery brands. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Mckee

customer_reviews.title: Currently super pregnant and am having the struggle of not being ...
customer_reviews.text: Currently super pregnant and am having the struggle of not being able to maintain myself quite the same as before however this little beauty has definitely been quite the little helper to keep me feeling myself! Only trouble I had was it seems to be a not specific on the batteries it likes. Tried some cheapo dollar store batteries at first and it wouldnt turn on I thought I got a dud until I switched to better batts and now it works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Jazy

customer_reviews.title: Does what you need and doesn't hurt
customer_reviews.text: I've tried half dozen different shavers/razors for shaving... the area. This is the only one I like. It's a comfortable size and shape for your hand, and it's easy to get... around. Whether you want to trim or take it all off, it's great Note: If you use it without the plastic trimmer, hold the head flat on the skin and use in the direction shown in the image in the directions or you will hurt yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working after few months
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed with this trimer. I did some research before buying this product and apparently all the blogs that I read recommended this trimer because is affordable and que quality is "ok". DO NO BUY THIS TRIMMER, it stopped working after a couple of months and I do not even used it more than three timer peer month. It's a total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Armida Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Good price and gets the job of making the downtown ...
customer_reviews.text: Good price and gets the job of making the downtown area a little less scary done. My husband and I both used it, I think that its a little easier for dudes to use because us ladies have got more twists and turns to deal with. I did find that I can't use it with the guard on at all, it really doesn't do anything with the plastic piece on top, you've got to take it off and just go for it.
customer_reviews.author: MJR

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect and when it works it is great! But it breaks very easily so be sure to take care of it and if used in the shower be sure to completely dry off before putting away. You may even want to take the batteries out after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Best grooming tool for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for over a year. I was afraid the battery won't last long. I was surprised to notice the opposite. I use it on my private area with no guard and I don't get any pinching and also on my eyebrows (setting #2). This is an awesome product!!! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Collins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price, great performance.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, although I have never used it for wet shaving, so I can't speak for water resistance. For safety reasons, although there is a guard to use, I would not recommend going lower than the 3 setting when shaving more delicate areas. Other than that no complaints, works great, long battery life, and if this ever dies I will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: puppyhyuk

customer_reviews.title: I’d recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like it. It did catch on some hairs. But it’s way better than other ones I’ve tried. I wouldn’t recommend it for someone who’s looking for a really close shave. This gives more of a buzz cut effect.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron New

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer is honestly not all that great. Yes it does trim after about 500 passes. Also the guard is too long so I took it off and using it without it kind of hurts. It’s pretty sharp and on a couple occasions it pulled one of the hairs out and made me bleed. My quest for a better bikini line shaver continues.
customer_reviews.author: Plasticmonument

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my needs. I use trimmers instead of razors on my privates, this trimmer is perfect for that. It doesn't cut me or pull on the hairs. It is by far the best trimmer I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Marques68

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF!!
customer_reviews.text: If you read the product details it says the razor head is waterproof. Don’t be mislead. The entire razor is not!! I’ve only used my razor a handful of times before the batteries started corroding and leaking out of the back of the razor. I can’t even put new batteries in to get it to work. Total waste of money. Why make a razor that isn’t waterproof??
customer_reviews.author: Beth A

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but not water sealed
customer_reviews.text: Overall I REALLY liked this trimmer; however, within a month of use, the battery area rusted and the device no longer works. I don't keep it in the shower, it's kept in a shower caddy and is removed from the shower when not in use, so I was surprised it rusted and broke so quickly. Its unfortunate as otherwise it was a great easy to use trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Bye-bye hair
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer works and works well. It takes just a few minutes to get the job done. The adjustable attachment for the blade is a nice feature and lets you control exactly how much you want to remove. If you are looking to be completely hair free; I suggest a brazilian wax or comparable procedure as this is a trimmer not a stripper. It is imperative that you use the trimmer on a completely dry area for a better shave, and use baby powder or cornstarch. Aloe Vera is great to use as a moisturizer afterward, 100% natural and soothing. Simple, quick and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Tr@cie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Was searching for a replacement for my bikini trimmer that was over 10 years old and stopped functioning. I love that this one is battery operated. No need to remember to charge it when you need it. It’s lightweight and not at all scary to use on my bikini area. It would be a bad place to get a cut. Very happy I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Died after a few months
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of use the unit needed new batteries. A couple months later the same thing. Then a few months later I put in new batteries and the until didn't power up. I took it apart and found corrosion all over the motor. It worked well when it lasted, but I would not recommend buying if you plan to use it in a wet environment.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fleisher

customer_reviews.title: Works and Cleans Well
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer works for all parts of the body. I have been using it on my cheeks and sideburns for a month now and it trims very close to the skin. I love how compact it is, which makes it extremely easy to pack and travel with. There's just one on and off switch and this makes it easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute perfection
customer_reviews.text: I can't stress how handy and perfect this is. I use it everywhere. It is easy to clean, goes into tight spaces easily, gives a clean shave without leaving bumps and cuts. Everywhere feels nice and smooth. I love this. One of my absolute favourite purchases ever!!!!!!!!!! Dont think about it, please just buy it
customer_reviews.author: Angel K

customer_reviews.title: For an even trim
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trimmer! I've had problems keeping hair trimmed at the same length since I tend to pass over areas more than others. But with the head on this trimmer it's not as noticable! I feel like my hair is the same length. It's also super light and easy to carry for travel. The only downside is it is battery operated.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Barely works to remove hair!
customer_reviews.text: This product works horribly. It is used as a bikini hair trimmer but you can BARELY get any hair out even on the 'sharpest' setting. I had another brand but cannot find it now. This one is terrible
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle and work with
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle and work with. AA battery operated. I haven't had any issues with it. Pretty straight forward, simplistic design. I prefer the male grooming kits that are rechargeable. If you want something that's easy to use, doesn't have all those extra gadgets and attachments, then I say go for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Diana N Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Great groomer
customer_reviews.text: So wonderful and EXTREMELY EASY EASY EASY to use. I use it to trim all the hair around as I do not wax. It doesn't hurt and it's not messy to use. I dont think it's waterproof but one time it accidentally fell on the toilet, so I picked it up and it continued working perfectly. I bought one for my mom too, and she enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: AAAA4ACE

customer_reviews.title: Your breast friend
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for over a year now and still love it! It is very comfortable, you're able to get into odd places without cutting yourself. I not only use this in my Brazilian area but anywhere else I need a trim. This won't leave your hair as short as a razor, but it leaves you nicely groomed. I love that this is cord-free, so easy to use. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nat valencia

customer_reviews.title: The bomb
customer_reviews.text: Wow let me just say this little trimmer is so bomb! Now when I say I've been looking for one of these for months I really mean months. I went to my local Walmart and target and they were all either too expensive or too fancy looking? I just wanted a basic bush trimmer. Now, I was letting my cha Cha grow out because I wanted to get a wax but something came up and this little guy worked smoothly and quickly! And did I forget to mention I ordered it the other night and I got it the next day! Is that even possible? Get it you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Lala Mua

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I wish someone could make an expensive powerful version of this thing
customer_reviews.author: Cyan

customer_reviews.title: Four good years together - a solid little mower.
customer_reviews.text: This little baby gets the job DONE. To each their own, but I prefer things to be shorter down there than the brush guard allows for so I just took that off. Never had an issue. We had four good years together, but now the motor is super noisy and doesn’t have a lot of power. I’ve opted for something a little more modern to replace it, but this is a great choice if you need a solid mower. Agree with the other reviews about waterproofness, lol. I’ve dropped it in the toilet numerous times and it always kept going perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste the money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time or money. This product stopped functioning in the first month. It produces choppy results and can’t handle the moisture of a bathroom via humidity. You get what you pay for here.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: I'm new to trimmers and these are great
customer_reviews.text: I've never used trimmers before. But I was so tired of razors. I got this specifically for my vulva. I was getting so much irritation with razors. Ingrown hairs and razor bumps galore. Switching to this is a game changer. I'm not itchy and irritated. It won't make you bald. But it trims everything down well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer but can't get replacement blades
customer_reviews.text: I've had this trimmer for a while and have been very please with it's power and ease of use. Has everything I want, however after time the blades need to be replaced and I cannot find them anywhere as they are discontinued by manufacturer. Huge disappointment. Buyer be warned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a little loud.
customer_reviews.text: It was quiet at first but got loud very suddenly and I thought everyone in the household may have heard it. It was quieter than some other electric razors, though! It doesnt hurt or tug at all. It doesnt come with batteries but it fits double A. It cuts the hair evenly and well, it is small and easily portable, and even comes with a little brush for cleaning it. You can adjust or easily remove the adjuster for trimming length!
customer_reviews.author: tessa hazzard

customer_reviews.title: Get ya one!!
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s job. Easy to clean. Bye-bye to razor burn and ingrown hairs. This thing is awesome!!! This is my second one. I purchased my first one about 5-ish years ago, used it 2-3 times a month and it’s just now getting to the point where it was dull and tugging hairs instead of cleanly trimming them. Hope this one lasts just as long!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have an ongoing issues with razor burn and ingrown hairs, this is a nice way to keep things trim without suffering from the aftermath of using a razor. I particularly love the adjustable guard
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Davis

customer_reviews.title: Junk-Fried After 2 Uses
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice with no issue. then went to turn it on the other day and it turned on for one second and then stopped. Changed the batteries just to be sure but no dice. While I didn't imagine it would be water-proof I figured it would be water resistant enough to survive being stored in a bathroom cabinet- apparently not. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is everything! I use a bikini trimmer. It has extra guards for “other” cuts too. Would definitely recommend. Battery operated. Has great power and lasts long
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta customer

customer_reviews.title: I am not happy with this trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Today was my second time using this trimmer to trim my bikini area. The first time it knicked me. I did not know when it happened and then a minute later I saw blood. This product claims to not give razor bumps. But today I shaved with it and a few hours later there were all these red bumps. I would not recommend this product, the blades are too sharp. I feel it is a safety hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and great results
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shaper/shaver. I misplaced this after I moved and had to buy a subpar razor but luckily I found this a few weeks later. Batteries needed are 2 AA and it seems to last awhile. Its easy to clean and easy to use. I haven’t cut or nicked myself, it always gives a nice smooth shave.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful-, My second purchase
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and so useful. This has been my second purchase. I did buy a different trimmer when i couldnt find Panasonic brand in a shop and that one was not effective at all. How much i missed this particular trimmer. Glad i found it online and am so so 'relieved' . Please don't stop making these.
customer_reviews.author: gvs

customer_reviews.title: Don’t pass this up
customer_reviews.text: This product works well when you do not use the attachment. If you want an honest opinion on how it works on below the waist it gives you a buzz cut like trim. Not a bald shave which is expected. If you want a bald cut then get a razor with shaving cream. This is good for when you don’t want a huge amount of hair down there. The batteries are not included but the product itself is very easy and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Sania

customer_reviews.title: My Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer is the best thing that has ever happened to my vajayjay and I. I still have not mastered the art of baldness after many many years of trying, so I needed something that could at least help me keep my bush low. This was my first electric razor and it does just what it says it does. I get really low without actually pulling/touching the roots, hence NO IRRITATION or bumps or new scars, or redness, or ANYTHING. Just a really neat trim. I would recommend to anyone looking for a low trim and who doesn’t necessarily need down there to be bald.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita George

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and adequate.
customer_reviews.text: Handy, pretty quiet. Works as,well as the batteries you use in it. The guard is simple but works, offers couple lengths . No guard gives nice short trim, not overly aggressive (doesn't cut sensitive skin easily). Overall a simple affordable trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bean

customer_reviews.title: Died after first use
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer worked pretty well the first time I used it. Went to use it a second time and it didn’t work. I thought the batteries can’t be dead yet but I changed out new batteries and it still isn’t working. It was stored high up in the shower away from the shower head so it couldn’t have gotten all that wet at all. I am totally bummed. Money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna N Rennhoff

customer_reviews.title: Good buy 👍
customer_reviews.text: This is a good alternative to waxing or shaving. I've been using this product for a year now and it still works great. The battery lasted a long time given that I use it once a week. I like how you can adjust how you want to trim your hair. Personally, I remove the cover since I want it close to the skin. It's easy to use and clean. Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to use, but I've used it about 5 times and ... now it doesn't work. I thought I had just drained my batteries but I have replaced them and the thing is deader than a door nail. Lame.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful or waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this trimmer. I ended up returning it because I did not think it was useful. I think this a generically made product that needs much improvement. Pros: Light and slim design. Cons: Not waterproof so I couldn't use it in the shower. Which I personally don't understand why you wouldn't use a trimmer in the shower. I also thought that the trimmer was not very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: LMSHIZU

customer_reviews.title: Love this little trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I recently stopped shaving because I was tired of razor burn, so I needed a trimmer to keep everything under control. This trimmer is a great value for the money! I love how compact it is so that I can travel with it, but it also gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Years past, I had a razor/trimmer that I was awesome and I searched for a replacement finally settling on this. The Bikini shaper kind of does the job but I am not really impressed and would never spend more then $10 for this inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this trimmer. Used maybe once a month, nothing very heavy. Went to use it yesterday and it was dead. Replaced the batteries, and still nothing. I hate throwing things in the trash, especially plastic but I have no choice. 16 months was all I got out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: When mine stopped working, I thought I could easily change the batteries , but no...it will not work. I have tried several different new batteries and I think it just got too wet to continue living. Very disappointed..but it is too late to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: S. Eller

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but wish it was rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: Item works well so far. I like to keep things nice and "trim" down there, so this does the trick! Only thing I don't like is that it takes batteries instead of being rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shaver!
customer_reviews.text: I had this shaver for years and years, until I dropped it into the toilet and it stopped working. I bought a few others, and never liked any of them as much, so I ended up replacing it with this same one.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Just tried it for the first time and I have been au natural for a few months. I get terrible painful ingrowns and cysts when I shave and don't have the time to go get waxed every 4-6 weeks. This worked perfectly to keep it short and clean. Needs batteries, I'll probably buy some rechargeable ones.
customer_reviews.author: Demi W

customer_reviews.title: Used once and now it doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I used this once and was happy with it. Then i went back to use it again and if didn't turn on. I troubleshooted, grabbed new batteries, nothing worked. I have had if for 2 months, and 1 month ago the return window closed. Not very happy about this. Money down the drain, unsatisfactory product.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Weak and does not cut well with the guard on
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this. But with the guard on it barely cuts at all. Had to go over and over and then finally just took the guard off. It works better that way but I will still be buying a new one. I should have known better than going cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Charmel

customer_reviews.title: Solid trimmer at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing for over 5 years now. I've used it to keep my bikini area trimmed and even to trim my husband's beard when his electric razor broke. This thing is solid, I rarely have to change the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: KMS832

customer_reviews.title: Woah. Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This thing is powerful! I was afraid I was going to make myself but I never did. It gives a nice low cut without being completely bald. I was able to quickly and easily shave my entire pubic area in less than 15 minutes
customer_reviews.author: TRagland

product_meta.title: Panasonic Bikini Shaper and Trimmer for Women ES246AC, Compact, Portable Design with Adjustable Trim Settings, Battery Operated
product_meta.description: The lightweight and easy-to-use ES246AC Panasonic Bikini Trimmer and Shaver for women provides close, convenient personal shaving, trimming and shaping. Just 1.3 inches across, this ladies bikini shaver trims and shapes hair quickly and comfortably, and an angled Panasonic bikini trimmer head follows natural skin contours for more precise and gentle women's grooming. The durable, stainless-steel hypo-allergenic blade is protected by an adjustable five-position bikini trimming and shaping head to let you set the precise lengths of hair you want to keep. This smartly angled waterproof bikini trimmer head also helps remove any stray or unwanted hair more easily along the bikini line. The bikini shaver head also reduces irritation and razor bumps for the clean, smooth shaving, trimming and shaping you want. At the same time, the trimmer head's softly rounded tips make personal shaving more comfortable and safe. The slim, portable Panasonic ES246AC Bikini Trimmer and Shaver for women is powered by two AA-size batteries (not included). A convenient personal groomer cleaning brush is included for regular shaver maintenance or on-the-spot cleaning anytime.
feature_bullets: Gentle shaving blade: Panasonic women's bikini shaver and trimmer safely and comfortably shaves, trims and maintains sensitive bikini areas with a hypoallergenic stainless steel bikini razor blade designed for use on sensitive skin
Personalized five position settings: Five position women's shaver trim head makes it easy to trim as close to the skin as you want while avoiding irritation and razor bumps
Waterproof trimmer head: Angled, waterproof bikini trimmer head helps cut and remove unwanted hair more easily
Lightweight and portable: Cordless, hassle free battery operated razor and bikini trimmer for women is powered by two AA size batteries (not included)
Cleans in seconds: Easy bikini shaver maintenance includes a cleaning brush for regular shaver upkeep or on the spot cleaning anytime; Operating time is 45 minutes

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
